TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit IsBoxed extends System.Object
public ref class IsBoxed abstract sealed

summary.span: 指示修饰的引用类型是装箱的值类型。

span.span: Indicates that the modified reference type is a boxed value type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Microsoft c + + 编译器支持直接在语言中的装箱的值类型。The Microsoft C++ compiler supports boxed value types directly in the language. 用作自定义修饰符，其中该修饰符修饰对正在装箱值类型的引用情况下，有关装箱的值类型的信息发送到元数据。Information about boxed value types is emitted into metadata as a custom modifier, where the modifier decorates a reference to the value type being boxed. 编译器发出元数据，以更改默认行为不恰当时，会在实时 (JIT) 编译器处理值的方式中的自定义修饰符。Compilers emit custom modifiers within metadata to change the way that the just-in-time (JIT) compiler handles values when the default behavior is not appropriate. 当 JIT 编译器遇到了一个自定义修饰符时，它将处理修饰符指定的方法中的值。When the JIT compiler encounters a custom modifier, it handles the value in the way that the modifier specifies. 编译器可以将自定义修饰符应用于方法、 参数和返回值。Compilers can apply custom modifiers to methods, parameters, and return values. JIT 编译器必须响应所需修饰符，但可以忽略可选修饰符。The JIT compiler must respond to required modifiers but can ignore optional modifiers. 可以将自定义修饰符发出到元数据中使用以下方法之一：You can emit custom modifiers into metadata using one of the following techniques: - 使用中的方法类如， ， ，和。Using methods in the class such as , , , and . - 生成包含对的调用的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令文件`modopt`和`modreq`，再将包含的文件内容组合[Ilasm.exe （IL 汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。Generating a Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction file that contains calls to `modopt` and `modreq`, and assembling the file with the [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md). - 使用非托管的反射 API。Using the unmanaged reflection API. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何发出为使用反射程序集的对象。The following example demonstrates how to emit an object into an assembly using reflection. [!code-cpp[Runtime.CompilerServices.IsBoxed#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.CompilerServices.IsBoxed/cpp/sample.cpp#1)]
